Projects.title: Task manager application
Projects.description: Python, HTML, CSS, and Django. A Task manager application designed for users to keep track of tasks they need to meet, with ability to login/sinup for a user dashboard.

Projects.title: Automobile dealership management
Projects.description: Python, JavaScript, PostgreSQL, RabbitMQ, RESTFUL API, microservices, Django, React.js

Projects.title: Conferences application
Projects.description: Python, Js, Django, SQLite3, RabbitMQ, Event sourcing, Message passing, RESTFUL API. Designed to house conventions, attendees, presentations, and presenters while fetching data from two third party APIs.

Projects.title: Scrumptious recipies
Projects.description: Python, HTML, CSS, Django. A recipies single-page-application designed for users to register and keep track of recipies with a social sharing function. - Object oriented design
